## ProgressMode type
<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type ProgressMode = 
/**
 * Real-time progress is used when we get real-time reports
 * about the progress.
 */
"REAL_TIME"
/**
 * Slowly increment progress is used when we don't know how long
 * an operation will take and just want to keep slowly incrementing
 * the progress bar.
 */
 | "SLOWLY_INCREMENT";
```
